Posts.Content: Kaakmylife wrote: Thanks for taking the time to read my post. I am 31 and the mother to 4 wonderful children! My youngest is still nursing and while I was nursing her I found a lump at the 6 o'clock position on my right breast about two weeks ago. With having no insurance for myself, I waited to see if it would go away. It didn't so I made an appt with my doctor..she stated that I have a superficial firm lump and she ordered an US. Which will be done tomorrow. She stated that they will more than likely want to do a biopsy on it. She said that she was fairly certain that it was not a cyst. I have myself a nervous wreck! Any advice, thoughts or anything is greatly appreciated! Thanks so much, Wendy Log in to post a reply
